programme.title: Wildest Islands: Sri Lanka: Monsoon Island
programme.desc: Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention. Poised just six degrees above the equator, it's less than 75,000 km sq in size. But it has enough wildlife to rival a continent.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: The Falkland's bleak, battered, and windswept archipelago lies 460 km from the South American mainland. Rugged mountains and expansive pristine coastline are a unique home for wildlife  especially for one of the world's most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Japan: Islands of Extremes
programme.desc: Japan's 7,000 islands stretch for over 2,400 km, and cover an incredible range of climates. Winter in the central and northern islands can be savage, but summer in the sweltering southern islands couldn't be more different.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

programme.title: Operation Valkyrie
programme.desc: High commanding officers conspire a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler in July 1944. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba
programme.desc: An escaped convict and his two pals take part in the Bay of Pigs invasion, then return home with a plan to get rich.

programme.title: The Unearthly
programme.desc: A mad scientist creates havoc when an experiment to stop the aging process goes awry.

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Schwampbillies / Remember Fort Sunny Bottom
programme.desc: When McGee, Gretchen and Squirt find themselves lost deep in the schwamp.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Stage Fright / Frankenfixer
programme.desc: The Bottom Dwellers stage Armand's awful play but a jealous Suzi unleashes a curse on the production.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: High Plains Garbage Eater / Dream a Little Scream

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: S.P.U.D.S / Monster Hunters "R" Us

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Cluck of the Were-Chicken / Gnome Force

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Pod Parents / Zombie Scouts

programme.desc: The campers track down a UFO inhabited by an alien from the planet Squipiter.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Butt-Squad / You Sank My Battle-Squirt!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duel for Redemption
programme.desc: When Jack is informed by Team Ragnarok's Dragan that Director Goodwin fixed the match they had years earlier, Jack begins to doubt his Turbo Dueling talents. Can Jack kick things into overdrive?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Soul Solutions
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: When Nordic Gods Attack
programme.desc: With only a handful of life points remaining and the Nordic God, Thor, staring down at him, Jack gets set to take on his next opponent - Team Ragnarok's Broder!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Tricking the Trickster
programme.desc: After swooping in take on Team Ragnarok's Broder, Crow finds himself battling two Nordic Gods  Thor and Loki! Can Crow defeat these two dynamos, or will this dynamic duo prove to be too much for Crow and his battle-tested Blackwings?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Yusei's Last Stand
programme.desc: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 4

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny tries to find some fine coupes for less than £1,500.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Women are more often prey than predators, but the exceptions are deadly women indeed. In this episode, we’ll discover what drove these deadly women to prey on the unsuspecting.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Love can be beautiful, love can be blind and love can be deadly. Desire and jealousy are powerful forces driving women to dark and horrifying places in their minds.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These women burn madly with jealousy, an anger so deep they’ll kill to satisfy it. What makes them turn from “green with envy” to “lethal with jealousy?" Find out as we explore their hearts of darkness.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The path towards revenge can sometimes lead to murder. It can be quick, fiery and violent. It can also be a dish served cold, the product of a calm, calculated plot.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The heaviest judgments of convicted killers are reserved for those who committed premeditated murder. These women plot and plan. They know the consequences of their actions, but still they go forward to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Blood ties are strong ties, sometimes strong enough to pull a person into a murderous conspiracy. When a family member wields his or her power, the result can be death.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Threat
programme.desc: A suspected drug dealer would stop at nothing to keep local and federal authorities from building a case against him. When his organization started targeting the government itself, federal agencies went on high alert.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Temple of Fear
programme.desc: In Miami, the discovery of a mutilated body sent investigators on the trail of a deadly cult. But agents found a wall of silence around the cult's members. Potential witnesses, terrified of reprisals, refused to talk.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Trail

programme.desc: The wide, often untouched wilderness of the Baltic hinterland is home to many animals. More than 35 brown bears live in the primeval forests of Alutaguse. In the spring, the Soomaa National Park transforms into a huge lake.

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.desc: The wide, often untouched wilderness of the Baltic hinterland is home to many animals. More than 35 brown bears live in the primeval forests of Alutaguse. In the spring, the Soomaa National Park transforms into a huge lake.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Cambodia – The Water Kingdom
programme.desc: Cambodia is one of the most bio diverse countries in Southeast Asia, whose wildlife and climate is ruled by the monsoon cycle. It is a wild land of extreme rains, raging rivers and flooding lakes that create great challenges for its animals and a fine bal

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia – Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as ‘mega-diverse’. It’s a land of two halves - West Malaysia is on the mainland, the tip of Indochina’s peninsula, and Eastern Malaysia is the top portion of Borneo.

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges: The Humber Bridge
programme.desc: Rob Bell tells the story of the Humber Bridge.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Bannockburn
programme.desc: Robert the Bruce's victory against the English in June 1314.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Hastings
programme.desc: The Battle of Hastings ended Anglo-Saxon rule in England.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Watling Street
programme.desc: Boudicca's uprising against the Romans in 60-61AD.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Bosworth Field
programme.desc: The battle that ended the Wars of the Roses.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 28
programme.desc: In their most daunting task yet, the cooks take over the kitchen of one of Australia's biggest Chinese restaurants to create an opulent banquet - and then in another sudden-death elimination, one more couple is forced to hang up their aprons for good.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 29
programme.desc: The cook-off is given an international twist to find the best contestants in the competition, before the two lowest scorers proceed to the sudden-death round.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 30
programme.desc: The two teams at the bottom of the scoreboard prepare their best three-course meal for Pete Evans, Manu Feildel and a panel of guest judges.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 31
programme.desc: Two teams of cooks prepare their best three-course meal for the judges in the first semi-final, before Pete Evans and Manu Feildel pick their favourite to send straight through to the final.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 32
programme.desc: Who will get the chop in the second semi-final of the culinary competition? Surprise guest judges join Pete Evans and Manu Feildel to decide which team progresses to the final.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Patterns Of Guilt
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Family Plots
programme.desc: Every family has its secrets, and sometimes blood relations lead to bloodshed. When murder becomes a family affair, investigators must turn to forensics to uncover family plots.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly intentions
programme.desc: When abduction turns to murder, forensic science is the only key to finding justice for the victims of a kidnapper's deadly intentions.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Coroner's Casebook
programme.desc: A good coroner provides what's necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can spoil an otherwise rock-solid case. Cyril Wecht and Henry Lee, two of the country's most respected coroners, share their cases and insights into crime solving.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Signed In Blood
programme.desc: Handwriting Analysis: We've all heard that our handwriting tells more about our personalities than we think. Are we risk-takers, have low-esteem, fun loving, or are we capable of murder?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Using only their eyesight, their noses and their taste buds, the four remaining chefs must re-create a dish without a recipe.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create fusion dishes by mixing cuisines from two different countries, the winner has a dinner date with Chef Ramsay and their family while the losers participate in moving day.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two finalists are taken to LA Market where the winner will work, and told to cook five dishes for a taste test.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The signature dish challenge kicks of Gordon Ramsay's US cooking competition, with the most successful team getting to enjoy a lunch at the LA Market restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With a trip to Palm Springs in a private jet up for grabs, the contestants compete by cooking four pieces of meat to Chef Ramsay's instructions.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A trip to a medieval-themed restaurant is up for grabs for the team who complete a special meal for 50 children and their mothers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues on a wild 60's inspired show truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage: Ten Ton Truck
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a vintage military transport truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1929 Ford Roadster Pickup

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1954 Chevy

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel looks back on the Best Builds of season 1

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel hammers down on the best builds of season 2

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: There Ghosts The Neighborhood
programme.desc: TAPSis called out to Joplin, Missouri to help 3 generations of afamilyliving on one haunted estate! Could both houses on the property harbor entities that couldbring harm to their children?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Scream Park
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Sylvan Beach, New York where the new owner of a historic amusement park finds himself in the middle of a mystery.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Mission
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to San Juan Capistrano, California to investigate the San Juan Capistrano Mission.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS drivesto the Otesaga Resort Hotel in Cooperstown, NY. Employees are terrified by voices calling out to themand doors swinging all on their own.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Reform School
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters the TAPS team investigates Preston Castle, a once notorious reform school for boys in Northern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Ax Men: Life & Limb
programme.desc: The Ax Men are back to take on North America's deadliest job. Gabe Rygaard faces the toughest challenge of his career as he struggles to keep the family operation in business without his father Craig, who suffered a career-ending injury last season.

programme.title: Ax Men: Sloppy Joe
programme.desc: Mother Nature as temperatures climb and a massive forest fire burns just over the mountain. Joe is still reeling from his injury, and what should be easiest site of the job could already be too much for the Papac crew.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: Peter helps restore a Manitoba couple’s love for logs by building a home to replace the one they tragically lost to fire. Meanwhile, the renovation of a neighborhood bar nearly drives Bryan Jr. to drink.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Frying Pan into the Fire
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. whips up an outdoor kitchen before hitting the beach in search of the ultimate driftwood bar.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Going for Gold
programme.desc: Joel takes on the mother of all builds – a 20,000-sq./ft. Pennsylvania mansion complete with walk through tree, hand-carved totem pole and 3-story spiral log staircase.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Compatibility Test Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne reaches out to a relationship expert, then comes to believe that she and Nick have compatibility issues.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Good Cop, Bad Cop Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne gets tired of playing the role of bad cop to Nick's good cop, she makes it Nick's job to say \\"No\\" to the kids for an entire week.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mr. Almost Episode
programme.desc: Nick runs into an old college friend, who convinces him to bring Deion Sanders aboard his energy drink business – with humiliating consequences.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Play Date Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne and Nick go out with another couple, but the double date soon fizzles when an accusation flies.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lindsey Gets High Episode
programme.desc: Former child star Todd Bridges guides Lindsey on a wild odyssey to teach her the dangers of drug use. Ice Cube, Charlie Murphy and Jerry Springer also guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Liar, Liar Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne insists that everyone in the family tell the truth at all times after she catches Nick in a lie.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Fight Party Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick Gets Jealous Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne helps a professional baseball player develop a charity event, but Nick is thrown a curve when he gets jealous of the two being together. Ice Cube and Jaleel White guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Test Taker Episode
programme.desc: Kevin gets roped into taking a test for a peer, spinning into motion various complications.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Compatibility Test Episode

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger

programme.title: Dynasty: Sammy Jo
programme.desc: Krystle accompanies Daniel to New York for his reunion with Sammy Jo, the child he's never known. While looking through photos Ashley snapped on assignment at a rock concert, Jeff is stunned to spot Fallon among the crowd.

programme.title: Dynasty: Kidnapped
programme.desc: As Alexis and Amanda emerge from an exclusive bridal salon, a car suddenly screeches to a halt and Amanda is pulled inside. A high-speed chase ensues. As Dex forces the kidnapper's car onto the sidewalk, Amanda breaks free.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Heiress
programme.desc: Dex tells a devastated Krystle that Daniel Reece is dead. Steven is outraged when Sammy Jo decides to fight for custody of her son in court. Jeff proposes marriage to Ashley. Sammy Jo learns that her monies will be held in trust with Krystle as executor.

programme.title: Dynasty: Royal Wedding
programme.desc: Elena confesses to Amanda that nothing happened in the bedroom with Prince Michael. Sammy Jo fits her roommate Rita with a blonde wig and has her practice duplicating Krystle's voice. Fallon has chosen a new name and heads for Denver.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Aftermath
programme.desc: Those surviving the massacre in Moldavia are separated and held at the palace; Krystle and Alexis are imprisoned in the palace dungeon; Sammy Jo reveals her scheme to Rita; Fallon, suffering from amnesia, reacts to seeing the name Colby.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.158
programme.desc: College students sue ex-friend over lease break. Woman denies child support responsibility if son not living with her; grandmother sues for medical bills.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.40
programme.desc: Electrician denies vandalizing home, stealing materials post-firing. Expert witness called for damages/Woman sues ex for furniture return; he claims she gave it when moving out.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.200
programme.desc: Teens deny vandalizing a teacher's car with rocks; a surprise witness emerges. A woman sues her ex-fiancé for money invested in his home and furniture return.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.16
programme.desc: An attempt to serve divorce papers to a man and his new girlfriend allegedly ends in an act of vandalism and assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.209
programme.desc: A woman’s Chihuahua is killed by her neighbor’s larger dogs; she sues for damages. A teenager accuses her ex-boyfriend of trashing her New Year’s Eve party hotel room; she claims he was hitting on another woman.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171
programme.desc: Teen sustains broken eye socket in black sweatshirt altercation; accused claims self-defense. Man aids son with financial aid post-back injury, demands repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.260
programme.desc: A young woman sues for damages after a catfight at a party. Another woman claims chest contusions from breaking up the fight and sues the man she alleges beat her up.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.1
programme.desc: A month after meeting online, unwed parents decide to live together but then fight over cross-country moving expenses/Judge Judy asks if a man will remove and hand over one of his diamond earrings to pay a single mother back for an alleged loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.46
programme.desc: Man defends against ex-girlfriend's claim of unauthorized use and damage to her Buick Regal, insisting it was a hit-and-run/Woman sues former friend for allegedly stealing belongings stored in her garage.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Jesse Tyler Ferguson
programme.desc: Actor Jesse Tyler Ferguson joins Bear on a 6,000-foot descent along the cliffs and ridges of Croda dei Toni; Ferguson shares insight about his sudden rise to fame.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Michelle Rodriguez
programme.desc: Actress Michelle Rodriguez and Bear go to a desert Nevada; unexpected high winds during a sky-diving trip send Michelle off course; Michelle and Bear must come up with clever ways to stay hydrated.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Scott Eastwood
programme.desc: Actor Scott Eastwood joins Bear on a journey through the harsh Bulgarian outback; the duo rappel from a towering arch, cross a raging river, descend into a dark cave and face off against a snake; Scott details growing up with his famous father.

programme.desc: Bear takes one of the best athletes of all time, Roger Federer, on a daring adventure through the Swiss Alps as they attempt to navigate the tough terrain. They descend a frozen waterfall and use tennis rackets as snowshoes.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Lena Headey
programme.desc: Lena Headey and Bear journey through Spain's Iberian Peninsula; they rappel from a towering ridge, dine on bone marrow from a goat carcass and cross a lake using a makeshift raft during an unexpected storm; Lena details her life and rise to stardom.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, President Barack Obama
programme.desc: President Barack Obama and Bear Grylls explore the Alaskan wilderness, where they observe evidence of climate change, sample wild salmon and catkins tea made with water from melting glaciers; Obama discusses his official duties, parenthood and faith.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: Arthur: Get Smart/Baby Steps
programme.desc: Everyone loves HUGO--the new interactive whiteboard that claims to be 100% accurate. If only Mr. Ratburn knew how to use it. Mei Lin can say "hello" AND play the piano?!? Kate can't even wave!

programme.title: Arthur: Cents-less/Buster the Lounge Lizard
programme.desc: Mr. Ratburn decides it's time for his class to learn a little about money. For the entire weekend, no one in the class can spend a cent. Buster has the brand-new Dark Bunny Dark Buggy, complete with grappling hook and voice commands!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Plays The Blues/Buster's Sweet Success
programme.desc: Arthur's beloved piano teacher is retiring, but she assures him that the new teacher is outstanding--and famous, too! When Buster signs up to sell candy for the band, he figures it's easy money -- who doesn't love chocolate?

programme.title: Arthur: The Last of Mary Moo Cow/Bitzi's Beau
programme.desc: When Mary Moo Cow is cancelled, D.W. is devastated. How can television--or life as she knows it--ever be the same? Buster hasn't yet met Bitzi's new boyfriend, but he fears the worst. What if he is a Mom-stealer?

programme.title: D.W. and the Beastly Birthday
programme.desc: Time to put on your party hats and dancing shoes – D.W. is turning five! When her birthday doesn’t go as planned, D.W. runs away to the magical island of Ukubonga. This is one party you don’t want to miss!

programme.title: Arthur: The Good Sport/Crushed
programme.desc: When the Athlete of the Year Award doesn't go to Francine, she makes no effort to hide her hurt feelings from the recipient. Arthur can't believe his parents are hiring a babysitter--he's 8 years old, and babysitters are b-o-r-i-n-g!

programme.title: Arthur: The Squirrels/Fern and Persimmony Glitchet
programme.desc: After watching the classic horror movie, "The Squirrels," Arthur and his friends are scared to step out into the playground, and everywhere else! Fern's story about perfect Felicity Bonchance is thought perfectly boring by her friends.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Green Thumb/My Fair Tommy
programme.desc: Buster finds out that his collection of old food makes excellent compost--which makes for even better tomatoes! Then, neither of the Tibble twins has ever won the coveted "Good Behavior of the Week" cupcake award.

programme.title: NEW: World War II in HD Colour
programme.desc: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy.France is liberated.

programme.title: NEW: World War II in HD Colour
programme.desc: Their attack on the Soviet Union having failed, the German Army suffers a series of counter-offensives on the Eastern Front. Wehrmacht's losses are huge as the Soviets advance West.

programme.title: NEW: World War II in HD Colour
programme.desc: Allies turn the tide in the Atlantic, where initially German U-Boats harass freely convoys to supply Britain. The route to bring American soldiers who will land on D-Day is clear.

programme.title: NEW: World War II in HD Colour
programme.desc: Italy's failed attacks in the Mediterranean region draw in the Germans.

programme.title: NEW: World War II in HD Colour
programme.desc: Japan attacks the USA on 7 Dec 1941. For the next 6 months, they continue to have successful attacks.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Aaliyah & Alicia
programme.desc: Aaliyah has been able to share her life struggles with Alicia. However, despite living only 70 blocks away, Alicia refuses to meet her as she hasn't come out to her friends and family yet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Mama doesn't always know best. Shuntay enlists the help of Nev and Max after her mum begins talking about marriage and uprooting her family to be with a man who refuses to meet in person. (S5, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mum is sceptical of Samm's identity. (S4, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Felipe & Jasmine
programme.desc: Single father Felipe is ready to settle down with Jasmine. However, the two have been talking online for eight months and have never met. Max returns and joins Nev to investigate. (S4, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Robin is desperate to meet her hunky, long-distance love in person. Nev and Max agree to help her hunt him down, but what they uncover turns out to be much more than Robin bargained for! (S6, ep17)

programme.title: The City: Forget About Boys
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy go on a series of dates ending in a blow-up at a club. When Olivia gets preferential treatment on a photoshoot, Erin reveals the real reasons she dislikes Olivia. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.desc: Whitney lets Roxy work on a big project, even though Kelly thinks Roxy can't be trusted. When Olivia comes up short for a new assignment, she and Erin have a huge fight. (s1, ep22)

programme.title: The City: Everything on The Line
programme.desc: A sales presentation with Bergdorf Goodman doesn't go as Whitney hoped, but it leads to an even bigger opportunity. Erin &amp; Olivia work together to put Joe Zee on the Today Show. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: The City: Show 'Em What You Got
programme.desc: Whitney shows her line at NY Fashion Week when one of Kelly's designers drops out. Joe Zee solves the issues between Erin &amp; Olivia by promoting Olivia to an on-camera interviewer. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The City: Friends In High Places
programme.desc: Kelly pushes Whitney to market her line after her first fashion show. Olivia refuses to support Whitney's line at ELLE Magazine, but Erin goes over her head to Joe Zee. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: The City: Professionally Dangerous
programme.desc: Whitney and Olivia go head-to-head after Olivia decides to interview her friend for ELLE, instead of covering Whitney's line. Roxy goes out with Zach. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Who To Choose? / You'll Never Have This
programme.desc: Audrina reconnects with an old flame, Cory, and finds herself juggling two guys. Spencer forces Heidi to kick her sister out of the apartment. (S4, ep10)

programme.title: The Hills: I Want You To Be With Me / It's Her Move
programme.desc: Lauren tries to make peace between Brody and Stephanie. Audrina wants to make things work with Corey, but Justin won't give up on her. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: The Hills: Back To New York / One Last Chance
programme.desc: Whitney travels to New York expecting to reconnect with Alex, but a new boy named Jay steals her away. Heidi is miserable after being fired, and Spencer is making matters worse. (S4, ep14)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Over the Edge
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2009 disappearance of Dawn Viens, and why her husband, California chef David Viens, jumped off a cliff when he became a suspect in her disappearance.

programme.title: 48 Hours: fugitive@hotmail.com
programme.desc: A report on the three-year manhunt and eventual capture of Dr. Yazeed “Yaz” Essa, a Cleveland doctor accused of murdering his wife, Rosemarie. In February 2005, weeks after Rosemarie’s death, tests proved that she had died of cyanide poisoning.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance for Justice
programme.desc: A report on the 1980 murder of Marilyn McIntyre, who was found dead in her home. Her husband, Lane, had returned home from work that morning and found her body. As police checked into his alibi, he named his friend Curt Forbes as a potential suspect.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Killer App
programme.desc: The dangers of anonymous chat apps; a father discovers his 15-year-old daughter planning to run away with a 30-year-old man she met online; a teenage girl is found stabbed to death after making friends online.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Citizen Jane
programme.desc: When Gertrude McCabe was murdered, her niece Jane Alexander was named her principal beneficiary. Jane, a widow in her 70s, began to suspect that her live-in boyfriend, Tom O'Donnell, might have been involved in the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death Wish
programme.desc: A report surrounding the July 2009 death of Jeffrey Locker, whose body was found slumped over the steering wheel of his car in Harlem, New York. When authorities tracked Locker’s ATM card to Kenneth Minor, Minor said Locker had begged Minor to kill him.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Rip Van Kitty/Grabbity/The Big Catnap
programme.desc: Garfield sleeps for twenty years and awakens to a strange future./Roy convinces Wade that the "law of gravity" has been repealed./The arrival of homemade cookies signal a "cat and mouse" game.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Goes Bad/Barn of Fear/Screaming with Binky
programme.desc: A criminal disguises himself as Binky to commit crimes./Orson and crew must spend the night in the old barn./Binky visits an operating room.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Idol of Id/U.S Acres: Bedtime Story Blues/Mama Manicotti
programme.desc: Garfield's and Odie's minds are switched./Orson tries to read Cinderella to Booker and Sheldon./Garfield helps a small restaurant owner battle a large chain.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon buys a new TV from Madam Murray. Wade suggests the Roy Rooster Fan Club be changed to the Wade Duck fan club.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Nighty-Nightmare/U.S Acres: Banana Nose/Ode to Odie
programme.desc: Garfield has a nightmare where he grows into a gigantic cat, climbing tall buildings./Roy has his feelings hurt when he is called "Banana Nose."/Odie meets with a tough alley dog and two lady dogs.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie trick Jon into not taking a trip on his vacation.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Penelope is back singing why she loves Garfield. Aloyisius Pig is back trying to cut the budget of the show.

programme.desc: The Rescue 1 team are en route to the scene of a horrific accident. A pedestrian has been hit by a truck and is in a critical condition.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper team are about to take off to rescue a seriously injured man.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 5
programme.desc: Birmingham biker paramedic Steve Harris races through packed city centre streets to help a man wracked by unexplained convulsions. Even an emergency transfer to hospital doesn’t bring an end to the mystery!

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 7
programme.desc: A toddler is brought in with sepsis and 84-year-old Norman has had a fall.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 2
programme.desc: New doc Jake's first patient has fallen down the stairs.

programme.title: Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must out-think their unstable ex-Scorpion member after he kidnaps Toby and threatens to kill him unless his cunning demands are met.

programme.title: Scorpion: Civil War
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must put aside their personal and romantic predicaments when anonymous hackers with unknown motives take control of U.S. military aircraft and warships and point weapons at American cities.

programme.title: Scorpion: And More Civil War
programme.desc: Just as Team Scorpion makes headway against the hackers controlling U.S. naval destroyers, they learn that a U.S. nuclear submarine also has been hacked and has a missile about to launch.

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: The Great Divide
programme.desc: When Stunticon Drag Strip steals a powerful Cybertronian artifact known as a Gravitic Adjuster, the Bee Team gives chase but are caught in an explosion that once again fuses them into the Ultra Bee Team Combiner (UBTC).

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Get a Clue
programme.desc: A string of mysterious explosives thefts leave the Bee Team flummoxed, but Strongarm is convinced that there's a criminal mastermind at work.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: DRIFT's former mentor SHADOW RAKER, a Fagin-like thief, has come to Earth to reclaim what he believes to be rightfully his — JETSTORM and SLIPSTREAM!

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Disordered Personalities
programme.desc: After Fixit's latest attempt at combining the team, the Autobots ends up swapping bodies! They then discover that the Stunticons have entered the local Grand Prix, assuming that whomever wins will be crowned the literal “ruler of the roads.”

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Guilty as Charged
programme.desc: Strongarm's best friend from her time at the Police Academy, Chicane, shows up at the Scrapyard.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: When Fixit discovers an ancient Cybertronian signal originating on an island off the coast of England, he begs Bumblebee to tag along on the investigation.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: The Fastest Bot Alive!
programme.desc: When FIXIT attempts to sample GRIMLOCK's DNA for a bot-combiner experiment, his Particle Sampler instead invests the once-slow Dinobot with dangerous super speed!

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Railroad Rage
programme.desc: In his haste to polish Drift's Katana, Slipstream accidentally uses an acid that wrecks it. Before he can make repairs, the Bee Team races off to stop the Stunticons from stealing a high-tech train's engine.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Combine and Conquer
programme.desc: Bee insists his team begin to follow his orders more rigorously, but this new micromanaging strategy shows cracks when Motormaster attacks a Meteor Deflector facility.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Moon Breaker
programme.desc: The Bee Team is about to embark on a mission to the moon to retrieve the last remaining cache item, when Optimus Prime arrives to recruit Drift for a special assignment.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Exiles
programme.desc: The Autobots are attacked by Steeljaw and his pack and driven from the Scrapyard. In the process, Sideswipe is nearly left behind, drudging up bad memories of his days alone on Cybertron.

programme.title: Survivorman: Smoky Mountain Sasquatch
programme.desc: Les goes deep into the heart of Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains in pursuit of Bigfoot. Encounters with an unknown creature have been reported in this black bear hotspot, and Les knows that where bears thrive, Sasquatch can thrive, too.

programme.title: Survivorman: Lost at Sea
programme.desc: Les will be set adrift in an inflatable life raft off the coast of Belize. Not only does the life raft have a few bad water leaks, but it also leaks air, requiring Les to frequently re-inflate it.

programme.title: Survivorman: Temagami Forest
programme.desc: Les returns to the oldest mountain ranges in North America, The forests of Ontario's Temagami, to survive for ten days with no food, no water, no shelter, no safety and no camera crew. Facing the dangers of packs of wolves and vigilant moose.

programme.title: Survivorman: Dangers
programme.desc: Les Stroud packs 25 years of survival knowledge into one 45- minute crash course in this fast-paced new compilation.

programme.title: Survivorman: Grenada Jungle
programme.desc: Les treks through the thick mountain rainforest to survive on the peak of Grenada's largest active mountain. Mona Monkeys, tarantulas, scorpions, armadillo, parrots and possums all live in this vibrant ecosystem, offering an abundance of food and danger.

programme.title: Survivorman: Incan O'ero High Priests
programme.desc: Les and crew climb to 16,000 ft up dangerous Mt. Sinkara to join 80,000 indigenous Andeans as they make their yearly pilgrimage to the holy site of Qollorit'i.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A decomposed body is found in a barrel, and a dilapidated address book may hold the answer, but investigators must find a way to read the pages because the passage of 30 years has turned them blank.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a policeman's home is burned to the ground, he later arrests a man who confesses to the arson, but the confession is dubious.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a pregnant woman was attacked, her unborn child was killed. She accused her husband, who spent years in jail until new DNA evidence emerged.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mother and her two young daughters are found brutally murdered and sexually violated. The crime scene has no shortage of evidence, but investigators cannot find a conclusive link to their prime suspect.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young girl is found dead, the victim of an apparent sex-killer. There are few clues to the killer's identity, but authorities are intrigued by unusual orange fibers embedded in clothing found near the victim.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man descends into a life of seclusion and is later accused of killing his wife, but the marks found on her body could prove his innocence.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a Texan hospital, more kids are dying than in any other hospital in the country. Police close in on a nurse who was on duty during the fatalities.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When the decomposed body of a young girl is discovered, police have no clues to her identity. But days earlier, a stabbing victim told them she thought she might have witnessed a murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a doctor's wife disappears, investigators use concrete from the doctor's yard and the recollections of a child to determine what happened.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Romanian archbishop Valerian D. Trifa, living in the U.S., is accused of being a Nazi war criminal, and forensic experts find evidence on an incriminating, 40-year-old postcard.

programme.title: Mega Transports: Wind Park
programme.desc: A wind park needs to get from Europe to Asia. Over two thousand tons of highly sensitive and valuable cargo. On one of the world's largest heavy lift vessels.

programme.title: Mega Transports: Gigantic Autoliner
programme.desc: A transport to the other side of the globe. The Höegh Trapper is the largest automobile transporter in the world. Two hundred meters long, thirty-six meters wide.

programme.title: Mega Transports: Biggest Containership
programme.desc: When the first ship of the brand-new OOCL-fleet gets underway, more cargo is moved at one time than anywhere else in the world and ever before.

programme.title: Mega Transports: AutoClav
programme.desc: A unique mega transport made of steel and titanium with a special purpose: to extract tons of gold. This so-called autoclave is the biggest of its kind. Its weight: over one thousand tons.

programme.title: Mega Transports: Superyachts
programme.desc: Transporting a ship by a ship - this becomes necessary when the super-rich want their super yacht available on the other side of the world, but do not want to sail it there themselves.

programme.title: Wardens: River Rescue
programme.desc: Region 1 Wardens come across a squatter on public land that leaves them speechless. And Region 5 Wardens are on high alert at the annual Yellowstone River Boat Float.

programme.title: Wardens: Failure To Tag
programme.desc: Birds, bucks and missing licenses. This week the Wardens watch a clear violation take place in Region 5. Property lines are crossed in pursuit of upland game and a license check comes up empty.

programme.title: Wardens: Warden's Instinct
programme.desc: There is often a fine line between false information and the truth. Veteran Region 5 wardens use their sixth to bring game violators to justice.

programme.title: Wardens: Fourth Dimension
programme.desc: Fourth of July in Montana – Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Wardens: Behind The Shed
programme.desc: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

programme.title: Wardens: Fun in The Sun
programme.desc: When Jet skies get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

programme.title: Wardens: Above & Beyond
programme.desc: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Wardens: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: In 2012 The small community of Whitefish Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: Wardens: Invasive Species
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 it's up to the Wardens to educate the public.

programme.title: Wardens: Axel and Chains
programme.desc: When Wardens respond to a call sometimes getting there is most of the battle. And we pay tribute to an honorary warden that will truly be missed.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: Itʼs “back to basics” for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides itʼs time for his officers to get back on track

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A seasonʼs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: French Connection
programme.desc: While on a lecture tour with Nigel in Europe, Sydney is contacted by MI5 because she is the only one who can prevent an impending high-level assassination.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Midnight Flight
programme.desc: Germania, ca. 400 AD: an artifact called Gunther's Scepter is sealed in a vault. Kleine Burgh, 2001: Sydney and Nigel are hired to find it using a crystal and a stone tablet.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Executioner's Mask
programme.desc: When a model's face is disfigured after she puts on the mask of a French executioner, Sydney and Nigel will try and find the tomb to reverse the curse.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Royal Ring
programme.desc: When the British Museum gets Sidney and Nigel to help search at Tudor sites for a ring of King Henry VIII, Nigel is confronted with his self-confident pestering elder brother Preston Bailey.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Set in Stone
programme.desc: In a monastery, Knight Gabriel impales a demon, which then turns to stone. In 2001, Nigel and Sydney arrive bearing a letter from a monk, but the abbot claims it is a forgery and shuts them out.

programme.title: 27 Alien Encounters
programme.desc: Strange and bizarre UFO encounters abound, but recent Alien encounters by highly credible eyewitnesses are so unusual and perplexing that they challenge our understanding of physics and the Universe as we know it.

programme.title: Area 51, Roswell Crash, Alien Abductions
programme.desc: Area 51 is located at the center of UFO research and legends of extra-terrestrial folklore. It is located six hundred miles west of Roswell, New Mexico, where the infamous Roswell UFO crashed in 1947. Also in this episode The Allagash Alien Abductions .

programme.title: Ancient Aliens and the New World Order 2
programme.desc: Recent discoveries reveal that a highly advanced race of extraterrestrial beings came to Earth in our ancient past, but the shocking realization is that they are still here now, among us and may have a sinister agenda beyond our wildest imaginations.

programme.title: Abducted by Aliens: UFO Encounters of the 4th Kind
programme.desc: Are we being taken by beings from outer space or another dimension? A troubling phenomenon has been occurring for centuries.

programme.title: Ancient Engineers: Aliens On Earth
programme.desc: Our evolution may be influenced by our ancestors and their Gods. We are not alone in the universe.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Clare Wood

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Sally Anne Bowman
